content: Arm & Hammer toothpaste maker Church & Dwight Co Inc  said on Monday it would buy privately held Water Pik Inc  which makes oral hygiene products and shower heads  for about $1 billion in cash.

title: Church & Dwight to buy oral health products maker Water Pik
